class GreekWord

A class for working with a Greek word.

Constructor Detail

GreekWord

GreekWord(java.lang.String srcString)
Constructor verifies that String contains only valid characters.
throws:
Exception if not all characters in betaString are valid.
Parameters:
srcString - Greek string, in beta code.

 
Method Detail

countToInclude

java.lang.Integer countToInclude(java.lang.Integer startFrom)
Scans from a vowel within betaCodeWord to see how many further characters belong in the same syllable.
returns:
Number of following characters belonging to the same syllable as the indexed vowel.
throws:
Exception if the indexed starting character is not a vowel.
Parameters:
startFrom - Index of character to start scanning from.

countToInclude

static java.lang.Integer countToInclude(java.lang.String s, java.lang.Integer startFrom)
Scans from a vowel within a word to see how many further characters belong in the same syllable.
returns:
Number of following characters belonging to the same syllable as the indexed character.
throws:
Exception if the indexed starting character is not a vowel.
Parameters:
s - The word to scan.
startFrom - Index of character to start scanning from.

getSyllables

java.util.ArrayList getSyllables()
Breaks up betaCodeWord into syllables. Syllables must have a vowel, so we scan the string from left to right, and whenever we see a vowel, determine how many subsequent characters belong to the same syllable.
returns:
An ArrayList of beta-code strings, one per syllable.
Parameters:
wd - A single Greek word in beta code.

getSyllables

static java.util.ArrayList getSyllables(java.lang.String wd)
Breaks up a Greek word in beta-code into syllables. Syllables must have a vowel, so we scan the string from left to right, and whenever we see a vowel, determine how many subsequent characters belong to the same syllable.
returns:
An ArrayList of beta-code strings, one per syllable.
Parameters:
wd - A single Greek word in beta code.

toString

java.lang.String toString()
Overrides default implementation of toString.
returns:
Beta-code version of a Greek word.
